card.title: Rey Misterio Jr., Billy Kidman & Eddie Guerrero def. Vampiro & Insane Clown Posse (Violent J & Shaggy 2 Dope)
Harlem Heat (Booker T & Stevie Ray) def. Kanyon & Bam Bam Bigelow (c) — WCW World Tag Team Championship
The Revolution (Perry Saturn, Shane Douglas & Dean Malenko) def. West Texas Rednecks (Barry Windham, Curt Hennig & Bobby Duncum Jr.) (w/ Kendall Windham)
Buff Bagwell def. Ernest Miller (w/ Sonny Onoo)
Chris Benoit (c) def. Diamond Dallas Page — WCW United States Heavyweight Championship (No DQ)
Hulk Hogan (c) def. Kevin Nash — Retirement Match for the WCW World Heavyweight Championship
